ValidationRule.description: If "Incorrect Email Description" was already added and if the use is trying to remove it manually error would trigger
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( INCLUDES(PRIORVALUE(Ebot_Feedback__c), "Incorrect Email Description"), NOT(INCLUDES(Ebot_Feedback__c, "Incorrect Email Description")) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Incorrect Email Description cannot be removed as email response has been modified.
